```{python}
# Step 1: Simulate data
np.random.seed(123)
theta_real = 0.35
trials = 4
simulated_data = np.random.binomial(n=1, p=theta_real,size=trials)

```

```{python}
print(simulated_data)
```

```{python}
# Step 2: Define model using that data
with pm.Model() as model:
    theta = pm.Beta("theta", alpha=1, beta=1)
    obs = pm.Binomial("obs", n=1, p=theta, observed=simulated_data)

    trace = pm.sample(draws=500, tune=500, cores=2, init="adapt_diag")


```
